segments.text: Did you enjoy your weekend at the highland hotel ? I heard it ’ s and excellent place to stay and has good facilities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a wonderful time . The rooms are not very big , but they are well furnished . The restaurant is excellent and reasonably priced . There ’ s a sauna and a Jacuzzi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do they have a swimming pool ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , they don ’ t . they have a beauty parlor , but I didn ’ t go there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s very good . Check in and check out at the reception only took a few minutes . The wait staff is very good . A waiter recommended their baked fish , which tasted wonderful . The hotel was quite full , so I ’ d suggest making a reservation if you intend to go there . The hotel offers a discount at the weekends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds perfect . Did you have any complaints at all ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There was a problem with the internet access , so I couldn ’ t check my email , but I didn ’ t complain about it to the management .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose you were happy to forget about the outside world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I was . Here ’ s their business card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Was there a mina bar in the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there wasn ’ t . There is a bar on the ground floor and of course you can buy drinks in the restaurant to go with your meal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One of the things I dislike about hotels is that everyone expects tips .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . At the inland hotel , they have an interesting policy . When you check out , you put some money in a special box at reception . Each evening , the money in the box is shared equally by the hotel staff .
segments.speaker: S2
